messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

old blocked leavers thursday july pm re thanks more submitted device date dear thank pointing out did leaver please advised has completed per attached further assistance please hesitate thank much best regards analyst ext thursday july re hello extract seems pm he please apply changes per column thanks active active active active active active wednesday july dear well please advised changed by question please find attached user guide steps follow further assistance please hesitate thank much best regards analyst ext july hello please advise going approver please extended approver thanks best regards registered under number whose registered old broad street kingdom provide clients each subsidiaries separate entity has liability
